import React from 'react'; import { Segment, Input, Button } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { kadenaAPI } from './kadena-config.js' const App = () => { return (

Welcome to the Kadena Memory Wall

Smart Contract Details:

Address: {kadenaAPI.contractAddress}

Chain: {kadenaAPI.meta.chainId}

Network: {kadenaAPI.meta.networkId}

Engrave your name and submit a real transaction on the Kadena blockchain with just 1-click
); } export default App;
